attributes.action: A Football Fans Charter or Constitution.
attributes.additional_details: Groups such as the Premier League wield enormous power and can change the game without proper consultation of football fans.
attributes.background: Work with ordinary Football fans from each club to develop a Football Fans Charter that is used to improve scrutiny of groups such as the Premier League.

rejection.details:
You seem to want fans to play a role in the running and/or scrutiny of football clubs  but the petition doesn't specify what role they would play or how this would work. 

In any event, the UK Government's responsibility in this area is incredibly limited, as football clubs and the governing bodies such as the EPL and FA are private, autonomous businesses. 

Given your concerns about the ownership and governance of football clubs, you might however wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331589
